A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An uneven mess of a movie.  There is so much ridiculous stuff in this movie that it really cancels out the great things that it gets right.  The Leia scene is the dumbest thing that's ever happened in all of Star Wars.  

This was  a great movie if you focus on only Rey/Ren/Luke.  Unfortunately\, that would have resulted in a 45 minute movie.  The whole Finn/Rose storyline is rushed and pointless.  The whole Poe Dameron storyline is contrived and boring.  The movie outside of the Jedi/Sith dynamics is a very straight forward and paper thin plot.  

Snoke is completely wasted.  He only gets one real scene in the movie and then he is out of the series.  

They wasted Captain Phasma for the second consecutive movie.  That character is beyond meaningless in the scope of the franchise.  She's literally less important than Nute Gunray\, which is a tragedy. 

The pacing is terrible.  The jokes are largely unfunny.  The plot ping pongs back and forth between different characters so much that it never gains momentum.

Just an uneven mess.
